article.title: ATK Receives $10 Million Order for EPIAFS
article.author: Katie Packard
article.text: Alliant Techsystems (ATK) has received a $10 million order for Enhanced Portable Inductive Artillery Fuze Setters (EPIAFS). The contract was awarded to ATK by the U.S. Army Program Manager-Combat Ammunition Systems, Picatinny Arsenal, New Jersey.
